website_summaries.verdict: One of the better multi-platform headsets compatible with Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and PS4.
pros: Headset strap is comfortable to wear for long periods of time
Sound delivery is helped by a well-balanced frequency range between the mids, lows, and highs
cons: Microphone creates a loud static sound every now and then during talkback

customer_reviews.title: Gift that kepps on giving
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift to myself--to give to my husband when he plays video games! I hated having to listen to guns shooting, grenades going off and calling for airstrikes late at night. Since purchasing this headset for him, I am much happier! I can now sleep or read in peace while the game sounds are quietly confined to his headset! He says they are comfortable and the mic works great, It has been a win-win for us both. Best for BOTH of us!
customer_reviews.author: MomOfWildlings

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, bad comfort.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good. Unfortunately the headphones become pretty uncomfortable after about an hour of wearing. And the mic placement isn't really in front of the mouth either. There isn't really a way to adjust it closer to your mouth. Update: Headphones are horrible. There is now a crackling sound if you make ANY movement whatsoever. If you were talking with people, the crackling sound was unbearable to them too. I've basically stopped using them. Whoo... Only a couple months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Strand

customer_reviews.title: Junk headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are pretty much junk. My unit has lose wires at the jack, I’ve tested it on several electronic devices and all of them have the same static. The microphone is extremely sensitive, and has poor sound quality. 7.1 surround sound is a false claim. They barely show 2 channel qualities. I would avoid these. The people claiming they’ve never used better are either sponsored reviews. Or they’ve never used a premium brand.
customer_reviews.author: M Neid

customer_reviews.title: The headset never worked.
customer_reviews.text: This head set was great....when it worked. The headset sound was solid for gaming but the cord was faulty. I could never get a connection through the controller to hear the game. To top that, they asked me to remove my review months after and promised a gift card or new headset, but I've been ghosted. I do not reccomend buying from this company.
customer_reviews.author: MotownClown

customer_reviews.title: Awsome headphones with great price and quality!
customer_reviews.text: From the very beginning - the look, visual, style is very cool real cyber thing with blue led lights. The build quality is great, wiring, cushion, plastic materials appear to be durable. Sits very good on ears and head is very comfortable. The sound quality is perfect for gaming and absolutely fine for listening to music. For the price range, high material and sound quality ONIKUMA Stereo Gaming Headset is out of competition.
customer_reviews.author: Revaz Lortkipanidze

customer_reviews.title: Ouch. Your ears will want to die
customer_reviews.text: These headphones feel super cheap out of the box. Everything is big, ugly, bulky plastic. As soon as you put them on you'll feel like your head is going to explode as they grip your head so tight it feels like it's going to pop. Also they don't actually fit over your ears. The top part that sits above your ear pinches HARD and makes the uncomfortable to wear even a short amount of time. There's a lot of headphones on Amazon, I would suggest trying your luck with any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: it worked great...for 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I like that it blasts sounds great. When the opponent is coming towards you, the sound comes from that direction.. I don't like that it scratches my ears. Update: After barely 2 months, sound only works from one side of the headset. Connector cable has already broken.
customer_reviews.author: juliekaminski

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend for PS4/XB1 players
customer_reviews.text: The headset along with the earpieces are relatively big, yet comfy. However, if you’re someone using it for console gaming such as PS4/XB1, the actual audio insert gets staticky* with even the slightest touch of it. Also, if you want to enjoy the cool LED light, you need to insert the USB cord into your console as well as have it attached to your controller (hassle). The mic piece tip is almost impossible to flex/bend as well. There’s just a whole lotta cord and mess that comes with this controller compared to others that have better sound quality with less hassle at this price. This headset is clearly favored for PC gamers.
customer_reviews.author: Actually bought the item

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband who likes to play Xbox late at night after our little guy goes to bed. He likes to chat with his friends and really likes that the sound quality is so good with these. He's gotten so used to the surround sound of his games with these on, that it's hard for him to play without them now. So far, they've been dropped, bent, slobbered on (from our baby), and have been sat on, but they've held up. The sound quality is pretty impressive, especially for the price. We've had them for a few months with no issue, so I hope they continue to work well for quite a while!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for our nephew!
customer_reviews.text: Our nephew wanted nothing else from us than a way to solve his social gaming dilemma on his PS4. His current headset sounded like a CB radio from the 70s and friends on the other end claimed his mic sounded like he was wrestling a narwhal in a vat of jello. We sought to solve this problem by asking ONIKUMA to fill this criminally insane void of audio quality by purchasing this headset for him for Christmas. The verdict? Sunshine and rainbows -- trumpets blaring -- confetti and balloons falling from the ceiling -- that sound you heard Christmas morning was his PS4 social network clapping in unison that he finally conquered the narwhal. Would recommend for any other nephew!
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than XBOX headset and has surround sound + chat in one connection
customer_reviews.text: This headset works with the XBOX One S Controller WITHOUT an adapter. And it works WELL! If you look at the bottom of your controller where the headset plugs into and there is a small circular audio jack to the left hand side of where a typical xbox headset would fit then you have a controller that does not need the adapter. This provides game audio as well as chat in one cord. This headset is literally the price of, if not a little cheaper, than the regular branded XBOX headset and is 10000 times better. 5 stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Good headset for my a kid’s gaming computer
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my kid’s computers. They use them daily for gaming and said they sound great, both on the speakers and on the mic. It’s been a week and so far no issues after many hours of use. The noise canceling/supression must work well as i need to tap them on the shoulder to get their attention. On the old headsets i just spoke loudly and they could hear me. They look pretty nice as well. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Zschokke

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the headset for my 13 year old to use on his laptop. He was so excited when he unwrapped the present Christmas morning. He was even more excited to use them, they look great, sound great, and the microphone works as expected. He was able to take a break from all the hustle in the house and put on his headset and not hear anything but what he was playing. And we had many children running around the house!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Taft

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset haven’t had a single problem with it but boy is the cord long! The sound quality and mic are great. Definitely amazing quality for the price! My boyfriend has a $100+ headset for gaming and the only thing he says is his is more comfortable for long time wear. I haven’t had a problem but I never really wear it for longer than three hours! It’s perfect for my needs. Also the light does work when I plug in the usb!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Cox

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable (Used on PC and PS4)
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are comfortable for extended use and produce a clear sound both in hear and on the receiving end of the mic (according to people on the other end). They may be a little tight for some people, so be aware, but the cushioning seems adequate. I have used this for both PS4 and PC gaming, all attachments are included (mic and audio splitter) and it's worth noting that the USB is only for the lights and leaving it unplugged does not have an effect on performance. If having lights is important to you you will need an extender for console gaming solely for the USB.
customer_reviews.author: SnapShot

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars alone for customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this headset for my 9 year old for his birthday. I didn't want to spend a ton but wanted something that would last. So i was a little bummed when it shopped working recently. But i remembered there was some sort of warranty...so emailed their customer service and within a week, they sent him a replacement at no charge! He got it right before christmas so he was super excited about that! to top it off, they even sent an extra gift for the hassle, which made my other son super happy. I can't complain. Both my sons are happy and they are happy with the quality of their items. thank you!
customer_reviews.author: M Tran

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and buy these! Cheap and amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Keeping this short! We have kids (mostly toddlers) and can't and won't spend over 30-40 on a gaming headset. These were around 25 and amazing. The sound is great. Noise cancellation is a blessing from chaos going on outside of these and the chord is long, the volume is great and the surround sound for certain games is legit. The USB will need an extension but we do not care to have a headset light up on our ears which you can't see. Its a cosmetic thing but can stay lit with usb extension. Overall best money spend on gaming stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Lezcano

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound and very well made, sturdy, and good long cord.
customer_reviews.text: I like the long cord and it is made with an elastic material rather than plastic wire, so I believe wont break as easily. I have had so much trouble with cords breaking inside with other pairs. Only think I dont like is something they all do...covering my whole ear they make me feel very warm and have to take them off to cool down from time to time. But that is likely not avoidable and still get the same great noise cancelling and great sound. So I would buy them again I am sure. Well ask me in a year or so I could tell you better.
customer_reviews.author: Adelle D. John

customer_reviews.title: Great value in gaming headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are the best value for a gaming headset on Amazon. I found them based on another website's review. They are lightweight and comfortable. The ear cups are large, don't crank down on my head but give good enough isolation. Sound quality is great. Good base and good highs. I have a pair of 'namebrand' gaming headphones, and this Onikuma set destroys them for sound quality. Highly recommended. They come with a very long cord and a mic splitter, and the LED is a nice touch. The mic folds up and out of the way if not used.
customer_reviews.author: DenBroncoFan

customer_reviews.title: **Re-done review**
customer_reviews.text: New review-I contacted the company regarding the non-working headset, and they were very professional & courteous. They answered my enquiry promptly and sent me a new headset. Apparently the previous one had some manufacturing defect because the new one has been working really well. My son is happy with it and uses it for gaming all the time. He says the sound is clear and reports no issues at all. Thank you for great customer service!! Previous review-I wish I had bought insurance for this headset. Worked great until the right side stopped working within 40 days.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: It's a great headset. The lights work, and the sound and mic works really well. The mic is really good in picking up noises, as my friends could hear my roommates cooking and other activities going on around me. While playing FPS and other shooter games, this headset picks up footsteps and other movements really good. You can tell if players are above, below, or beside of you, and it helps to identify where shots are coming from. I would recommend this product if you're looking for a quality and affordable headset.
customer_reviews.author: Pikato

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These are actually pretty decent headphones. I haven't received any complaints when using the mic. They aren't too heavy and they seem pretty sturdy. The sound quality and bass is good. They even sound nice with music while listening on my phone or iPad. I just wish the volume went up a bit more. The style is a bit too bulky looking for me but the sound quality is what matters more.
customer_reviews.author: Ctillytillz

customer_reviews.title: Surround Sound Champ
customer_reviews.text: The headset has been awesome for my Xbox One! I’ve never played with a headset before so it was a major difference from just using my TV’s sound bar. Playing Call of Duty WW2 was incredible as I could here the games from all around me. The surround sound aspect of these is brilliant. The biggest thing I’ve noticed is how much these have helped while playing Fortnite (I’ve also used them to play on my iPhone and it’s great!) I can now here people running around me from all directions and can here if a missle is coming up from behind. I would strongly suggest these, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brenan Hudgens

customer_reviews.title: Muting function and volume control works wonders.
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with these headphones. Needed some headphones for my PS4 that connected to the controller via 3.5mm jack, since my Turtle Beach headphones wireless USB adapter sometimes would cut out even though I'm ~7 feet away. I'd decided to go wired. Sound is great, virtual surround sound, works well while playing Black Ops or Fortnite. Lights are good except there's nowhere to plug them into the PS4 controller so I just keep the USB cord that powers the lights wrapped around the cable. Oh! And these have a muting function and volume control. A big plus!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Broken after less than 10 uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these back in April. It's now January, and I've probably used them 5 to 10 times because I only have to put them on when I'm playing online late at night when people are sleeping. I occasionally used them for Xbox One. The were working great after the first few uses, but then they started getting static everytime you bump the headphone jack. If you don't hold the controller a certain way. I always kept them in a drawer, so I know they weren't getting beaten up. Add to that the fact that they are giant and kind of look ridiculous, and I would recommend against buying them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Ok for kids, but not for serious gamers
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price, however I was a bit disappointed with these. For all of the reviewers who said these were awesome, they must not know what good headphones sound like. They are made from a very cheap plastic, and the mic is not adjustable, so there is no way to bring it closer to your mouth. They get pretty bad feedback, and the sound comes through low and very distant. These aren’t powered, which is probably a big reason why. I bought them for my son who is just getting into online play. Also, for anyone out there with a Nintendo Switch, the mic does work for Fortnite. Haven’t tried it on any other games though.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN TATTERSFIELD

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boyfriend and I back in July and they are still in great condition. The sound that comes out makes us feel like we are in the same room as what we're playing. The directional hearing is spot on and has saved his life in games numerous times. The only issue is they only light up when the USB is plugged in so only he uses the lights at his PC. But I don't mind. The microphone is great and sounds very clear, and doesn't pick up any feedback. Very snug and comfortable on the ears for hours at a time. Definitely worth the money, they work better than some $80 headsets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate to try these out!
customer_reviews.text: Spent a lot of time looking for an affordable yet comfortable gaming headset to fit my needs. I’m pleased it’s not a USB headset. I’ve had a lot of issues with them. These headphone are comfortable and don’t cause fatigue. I enjoy the adjustable microphone even though it doesn’t have issues picking up your voice. Don’t get fooled into buying expensive headsets just because you feel like they are better! Highly recommend Onikuma and will be a future customer!
customer_reviews.author: Sgt of Marines

customer_reviews.title: You wont believe it
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect much for the price! I was shocked, very comfortable! Used them for gaming and for youtube. I did notice when I used it with aftermarket xbox one controllers the volume level was not the same from one to another. Hooked up to my phone it was more than expected. It seems like it depends on the device and not the headset. Honestly I will probably not spend the extra on Turtle Beach. I have had 2 Turtle Beach headsets and I am totally satisfied with this " El Cheapo"
customer_reviews.author: Andy Y.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Headset for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Had a wireless set and the USB unit was broken, couldn't get a replacement. Tried this wired unit and the sound is great, mic works fine and for the price I am happy so far. I spend long periods of time either playing online or listening to music and the ear padding has been better at breathing, other set made my ears sweat, yeah ewwww! So all in all I am better off I guess. I gave them a 5 star for durability at this time, obviously it's a little early to say any different.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Best value headset I've found yet.
customer_reviews.text: This headset is perfect. I've tried a few of them now and none beat this one in value. It's super comfortable, and it works with xbox or pc. If you are debating buying it, I suggest you buy it, you can't go wrong with this headset. Perfect for a casual gamer looking for an inexpensive headset that will last a long time. I've had this for almost a year using it quite often and it still works and looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Corry

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I was skeptical when I ordered this. For the price point, I wasn't expecting much, but I needed something for my XBOX One. What I received surpassed my expectations. Super comfy, and great sounds quality. My only issue is the random USB connector. It's a shame that it's not removable - I could care less about the lights. Otherwise, it's a magnificent piece!
customer_reviews.author: Aikavols

customer_reviews.title: Broke in a Few Months Time
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these for my boys and in only a few months both are broke. Cannot talk into one and cannot hear in the other. I contacted the company days ago to report the malfunction and inquire about the “2 year warranty” and haven’t received a response. Very dissapointing
customer_reviews.author: CMiller

customer_reviews.title: Solid Headset for Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a few of these for business purposes, intending to use them for making VOIP. The headsets do a good job of blocking outside noise, allowing our personnel to properly hear the customer on the end of the line. We haven't had any issues with the quality of input, and the output is pretty well done as well. The headsets are light, despite appearing bulky, and are comfortable to wear for extended time.
customer_reviews.author: Dark3nedDragon

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband for Christmas and he loves them! He said the headset works great for communicating during games and the headphones do help him hear better compared to other brands we have tried. In the past he had trouble hearing his game as good when the kids were being loud in the background... now he can play, hear better, and Fortnite as he wishes :)!
customer_reviews.author: KHearn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality sound with a truly directional virtualization of sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality sound with a truly directional virtualization of sound. Playing games like PUBG and Radical Heights one can determine location in virtual space down to a 5 degree variation. Example, I closed my eyes and had a friend run around me in game. Out to a distance of around 350 m I was able to find him by exact degree plus or minus 2. Playing music or video audio through it is near studio quality. Only slight downside is the length of cord, a full 3.25 meters would be preferable for most gamers i believe, to allow for slack to keep it from entering their gaming field. 5 out of 5
customer_reviews.author: Adelbert Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Really nice headphones, and a fantastic value!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't owned a set of headphones for a long time. But I recently got a gaming rig, and decided I wanted a better gaming experience. I looked around for a long time, trying to find a good pair, that wouldn't break the bank. I'm no audiophile, so I probably wouldn't be able to truly appreciate a pair of super expensive cans. I have to say, I'm very pleased with these! Great sound, and all of the bells and whistles I could want. I'd highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Works great with PS4
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my nephew’s son for christmas. He plays fort night all the time. Whe he opehed pkg on christmas he was so excited. He also received PS4 so he uses them all the time with the PS4. The blue light on the side gives it a cool appearance.
customer_reviews.author: DesertDog

customer_reviews.title: He'll like them. They always do.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my husband. He's had it for a few months now. He loves it and so do I. I no longer have to listen to his conversations when he plays online or to the cheesy sound effects and lame music that come from his games. Finally I can clean around him in peace and he doesn't have to pretend to be listening to me as he zones out. These seem durable and long lasting--not cheaply made. They are a little bulky and awkward to store, which is why he probably just leaves them laying around. Overall, they definitely seems worth it at their price point.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Early Impressions Are Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this headset for my son to use with his Xbox One S and so far it's great! I tried it out and the sound quality is exceptional and the mic works great and doesn't pick up too much background noise. The braided cables look sturdy and the inclusion of the splitter to use with a PC was a nice touch. Build quality appears good, but time will tell. Overall this is a great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Konon

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming headset !
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gaming headset ! 1 - Comfortable to wear for an extended period. 2 - Built strong - unlike some other headset which breaks at the hinge connecting the ear piece (I've had two Turtle Beach headset break on me, never buy Turtle Beach again). 3 - Sweet price point. 4 - Great sounds ! Can't go wrong with Oni-Kuma !
customer_reviews.author: AlohaFitz

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband to use with his PS4. We have not had these long, but so far, these have been great. They seem to be of good quality and we plan on getting alot of use out of them. He says they are very comfortable to wear for long periods, even over his thick glasses. When I tried them on they were also quite comfortable. They plugged right in and worked perfectly with the PS4. The sound is clean and clear. Overall, the design is great. The USB plugin for the LED lights is in an awkward place and not very useful for a PS4 player, but it seems it would be useful for a PC gamer.
customer_reviews.author: Molly B.

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Head Phones For a Bargain Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Onikuma Gaming Headset after my trusty Xbox One headset finally died (after 4 years of use). So far I've been extremely impressed with the quality of this headset. It's very comfortable sitting on your head and the controller is very well designed and easy to use. It also uses thick thread like cords so you don't have to worry about wearing them out or them ripping apart. According to my friends online the mic is top notch and they have no issues hearing me. So far I've been very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming headset!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great gaming headset! I have played games with it for the past few months, the sound is great, and the microphone has amazing quality! I play with my friends online, I never been told that they cannot hear me well! I really do recommend in buying this headset! (Note, this review was written by my son; he wanted to review this product. He does use the headset quite a bit, and so far I am pleased with the quality and expect this headset to last him for some time. At least I hope so since I funded it. :) )
customer_reviews.author: Brom

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones at a reasonable price. Buy them 1sr.
customer_reviews.text: My boys have used the Onikuma headphones for the past few weeks and have given them an intensive test. The Onikumas are by far the most useful and worthwhile headphones the boys have used. Those headphones are quality products and I wish I had found them before buying PS4 sets. The PS4 branded headphones don't hold a candle to the quality and functionality of the Onikumas I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. B.

customer_reviews.title: Priced right!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were very reasonably priced. They are plug and play for my PS4. If you want to have them light up, you need to plug it into a usb, but I am not interested in this feature. I just need them to talk with other player on the PS4. I am very happy with the sound. They do get a bit tight on my head with extended wear but that has more to do with my enormous cranium than the headset. Overall very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: LAB

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, my daughter likes them!
customer_reviews.text: We got these for my 10 year old daughter, who loves gaming. So far we are impressed. They fit well, and are comfortable. The sound is clear with no static. Everything worked the way it was supposed to. The only change I would make would to be to make the microphone bendable, but this doesn't seem to bother my daughter. Her friends said they could hear her clearly through the microphone. For the low cost, I'd say we are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Decent price - works well
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty comfortable and work really well. I use them on my laptop while I kill people and I can't hear the TV nor can anyone hear the splatters and gunshots. We've also used them with Roll20 with 3 people in the same room - one of them being my loud son - and, with a little tuning on the mic volume, removed feedback and echos. My only complaint is the USB is only there to make the lights work, which is really useless.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Great audio and mic -Durable and looks sleek -Comfortable fit around both the head and ears - Connects to nearly every gaming system controller (Old Xbox One controllers as the exception) - Great for gaming and Music Cons: -Slightly bulkier than I anticipated Summary: This headset is an absolute STEAL at it's price. Best headset I've ever used for gaming and would definitely recommend to gamers of any experience. They are slightly bulky, but the sleek design makes up for it! 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Good Headset, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: The headset is sturdy. The braided cord has a USB and a traditional headphone jack. Included is a two-way splitter so the mic can be plugged in separately. The splitter is also braided and matches the cord. Comfort is better than most headsets I have used, and is not a problem for 3 or 4 hours of use. Originally I ordered two for gifts, and then I ordered one for myself. The only improvement I would like to see is mic feedback, but at this price point I really did not expect that. Overall, a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Testy Tim

customer_reviews.title: love, love
customer_reviews.text: love, love, love... I am a avid gamer, WOW, Rift, Diablo, Heroes of the Storm, Guild Wars and GW2. I use Discord and Twitch very compatible to the apps and my Alienware Area 52 thread ripper machine. I Had turtle bay headsets which the cord started to fray it was plastic and started getting static. I like that the cord is wrapped in a corded sheath all the way in to the connector heads. Very sturdy and comfortable headset, easy on my glasses :) I paid over 150.00 for the TB's and they were flimsy and not comfortable. Great all around and environmental awareness. kudos Onikuma
customer_reviews.author: MzTodd2U

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using headphones and a cheap, clip-on microphone as my 'headset' before buying these but the guys I game with on Friday nights kept complaining about mike issues. So since I'm not a good gamer I decided to go the budget route but the only thing budget is the price. They fit well, they have deep bass, good positional audio ( which is very important for shooters, I didn't realize how much sound I was missing) and the microphone works great and is highly adjustable. They also look cool as they also have some LEDs in them that are powered by USB . I am planning on buying a second pair for my son for his birthday. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Desrochers

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and mic, low volume without amp
customer_reviews.text: Headset is comfortable for someone with a large head, and has a good mic that folds up when you don't need it. It has three output cables connected to it (unremovable): audio, microphone, and USB (USB is just for lighting I believe). Cable is braided and good quality. Sound quality is excellent and clear for the price, although it's a bit low when connected to my desktop computer directly. A headphone amp would certainly solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Chen

customer_reviews.title: I wear glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought my Onikuma's, I'd gone through half a dozen pairs of headphones. I'm a very clumsy person by nature, and most cheap electronics hardly last a week with me. Add that to the fact that I wear glasses, and headphones lose almost all of their appeal. So far, though, these Onikuma headphones have lived up to their advertisement. Even with glasses, they're very comfortable to wear for long periods of times.
customer_reviews.author: Gena C

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service - complete follow up till the solution was found
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and was working great for a month and then started giving me problem . There’s a lag in the voice and my friends on the other end can’t hear me properly and initially I thought that I can’t get any help to get it fixed and more than likely , I have to throw it away and buy another one but I was wrong once I sent an email, manufacturer’s customer service contacted me right away and solved my issue and I’m very impressed so I’m changing my review accordingly as I’m always for the company that stands behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: deep

customer_reviews.title: Nice Headset
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my teen daughter and she hasn't had it off since Christmas, lol. Not really but she has worn it for hours and finds it very comfortable. She uses it to play xbox with friends and finds the sound works just fine for her. It is not cheap feeling but not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Samoamom

customer_reviews.title: Great headset, no compromises.
customer_reviews.text: I use this gaming headset for my PS4, and it has met all my needs! The sound quality is very good for the price point, it can even rival that of a headset double it's price. The mic is very clear from what I've been told from people on the other side. I couldn't be happier and I'm glad that I chose this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Nino

customer_reviews.title: Fits people with large ego and large heads
customer_reviews.text: What the dogs howling. And the kids screaming. I can put on my headset and be enthralled in my Batman Arkham Asylum Game. And have no idea what's going around there's sound quality is superior to be able to find the riddles that I need to to complete the game!
customer_reviews.author: Big Stig

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: This headset is very good for the price. The sound quality is great. You can hear very detailed sound, and the muffs do a great job at isolating outside noises. The Mic is also pretty good. It doesn't add any weird noises when you talk, and it picks up your voice clearly. The one thing I do not like is that the mic and speakers don't work through the USB plug. The USB plug is only for the LED lights, so you still have to plug in the headphone and Mic jacks. However, this is not a big deal. It doesn't affect tge performance of the product. I'd definitely say this is worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Haifisch

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first gaming headset, but I have to say I am impressed with the sound quality and comfort this headset provides. Now, I'm not an audiophile by any means, but I can now begin to appreciate the difference between a good headset and a bad one. This one is definitely excellent. The headset is quite large, and I've got a big head. It's comfortable though. The cord is made out of this rope-like material that also adds to the comfort and helps with managing the cord.
customer_reviews.author: sandra reyes

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset - value is amazing compared to other headsets in this pricing/quality category.
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yo son got this for his birthday and it is by far superior than other headsets we looked at in this quality category. He also got the other "official" xbox headset (which he took back) because this one absolutely blows the "official" one away. The cord are quality but a little heavy duty. so just make sure they can handle a little heavier cord.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Brush

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: This headset is awesome! It has crisp clear sound that allows me to hear every detail of the game, it is comparable to turtle beaches in quality I'd say! This headset is really comfortable on the ears and on your head with its cushion. The microphone is really clear sounding according to my friends. The light up feature is also a plus which makes it stand out. I for sure would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Dependable Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these headsets my son has had from Onikuma and he loves them. He says they are comfortable, sound is clear in both the headphones and mic, mic is easy to move, and it’s durable. I have bought different ones in the past (from other companies) for a higher price that turned out to be complete garbage so finding one that is dependable is nice. My son even recommends it to his friends when they need a new headset. Also- the only reason we had to buy another pair is because obviously our cat has gamer envy and tried to take down my son by chewing through his cord. Nice try, Kitty. Nice try.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfHeathens

customer_reviews.title: Soft on ears and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are really top-notch. My son uses them daily with his gaming. He is in his twenties and is very picky about the headphones he wears because they need to be soft enough but also provide good sound quality. He loves these!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: great looking set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my gamer fiance and so far so good, he loves the soft ear pieces and sturdy over head piece and it comes with the different adapters which is nice also
customer_reviews.author: susan rogers

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: i EXPECTED A CHEAP SET OF HEAD PHONES, to my surprise the thing cheap is the price, they work on my PS4, XBOX and PC sound is unbelievable as good as another expensive pr I paid over $100 for. the seller was fast and concerned that I was satisfied I have 6 grandkids that love to game I thinkl I will be purchasing more as soon as they see them
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R Thompson

customer_reviews.title: What a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product as a replacement headset and I'm glad i did. The bass comes in deep and it has good sound throughout no matter which games i have played. It feels very durable, unlike many other headsets at this price point. I'm glad i bought this instead of another turtle beach.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year bought these with his birthday money. We have been through a few pairs and the mic or one ear always seems to go out fairly quickly. He has been using these headphones problem free for a few months now. They are comfortable, not too hot and most importantly, they work.
customer_reviews.author: Junemommy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent low-cost gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this headset for six months, and it has held up very well. The sound quality is good, and they are quite comfortable. I'm very pleased with this purchase, and would recommend this headset to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: OperaFamily

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for PS4
customer_reviews.text: After having this product for a week it has done its job. The overall sound quality is great, the volume control makes it easy for any user to lower or increase the volume. The microphone may feel that it far away from the user's mouth, however I have not had any players say that they could not hearing me. In fact they have said the complete opposite that my voice is crystal clear. The led on the headphones give the headphones a more "cool" look. Overall I am satisfied with my product and will be purchasing more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Abel

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this headset and will probably buy another
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a good headset and saw that this one was marked as a best seller and i feel that it fits that category. they are comfortable, the sound is better then i expected and the mic has good output. The frame and cord feel sturdy so i should get alot of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Great on Xbox One.
customer_reviews.text: My old headset died after a few years so I took a chance in this brand. So far, this has been a great replacement. Works well with my XBox One controller with the 3.5mm jack. They’re a bit bulky, but also feel pretty rugged. I wish it didn’t have the usb cable, but if you’re using them with a computer instead of a game console it might be a nice feature. Time will tell on durability, but as of now I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Great multipurpose headset
customer_reviews.text: We received this headset as part of a gaming PC build, and have been very impressed by the quality. The headset has a solid build to withstand the rigors of use by our tribe of kids, and comfortable fit on a variety of head sizes. Sound quality is great across not just gaming apps, but for music as well. Clear, crisp high tones and meaty bass are both rendered with great clarity. I really couldn't ask for anything more from a set of gaming headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L Rubesh

customer_reviews.title: Lights only work when USB plugged in
customer_reviews.text: Good sound for gaming for my 10 year old. Mouth piece only moves up and down does not flex toward face. Lights only work in USB is plubed in so they do not light up when plugged into PS4 controller not a big deal but it's one of those things
customer_reviews.author: jessi

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice. Fit is top notch. VERY comfortable. I love the sound! Was surprised at the quality of these. Cables look strong. Build is solid. Love the inline volume and mic control. And the mic. Yes, top notch. SOOO important to my gaming. Everyone says it is crystal clear. Overall very satisfied. And did I mention audio quality? Yep very clear, nice bass.
customer_reviews.author: William L.

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 5 months. Then they fell a distance of about 6". Now the right earphone no longer works, and the left is sporadic. Internal electronics are apparently FAR too delicate for regular use. I'll also support other comments about the mic: it's badly placed, not adjustable, and not sensitive enough to make up for it. It works, but I end up sounding pretty faint to everyone, not matter how high I set the sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: J. Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great headset, especially considering the price. I plugged this into one of my new Xbox One controllers and it worked instantly - no complicated setup was required. Here I am a month later, and I've had no issues with it. The sound is great and it is so much nicer having the game sounds come through the headset instead of relying on the TV sound. I can hear my friends talk clearly when I'm in party chat, and they have also told me that they can hear my voice clearly, which means that the mic on this headset is solid. I'm very happy with this purchase and plan to use these headphones for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaR

customer_reviews.title: Good price & sound
customer_reviews.text: Update 11-23-18 They no longer work. Honestly they did not laat very long one side went out first, now both This is my first gaming headset, I really liked it. There is a big difference from using regular earphones. I can hear more clear, more bass, and I can tell which direction the sound comes from. The mic is clear on the other end and the music, and game noise is also clear and loud. I like that I can adjust the volume or mute the Mic as well. I give it a 5/5. Great price
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This headphones do not last...
customer_reviews.text: After Three months of use the headphones no longer work. The sound was good while it lasted and they look nice. But they only lasted three months. My son took very good care of them and they were never dropped or misused. It looks like the little circuit on the volume control is not attached well enough and the wires would separate from this easily.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Gaming headset!
customer_reviews.text: My kids have a way more expensive headset and they fit over this one as they love it way better than the other one. So we bought another one because we love it so much. Comfort level is great. Soft large hear pieces. I would call these noise cancelling as once you put them on it cuts so much of the sound out in the environment. The speakers are loud enough with out ever getting ear busting. But the best part is the clear crisp sound is perfect. The kids say they can hear footsteps in FortNite better than any of the other headsets they have used. Basically for the money these are AMAZING Great product for a Great Price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyson W

customer_reviews.title: Target quality for walmart price
customer_reviews.text: Great headset for the price. I was leery that they would not cover my ears entirely, but they do and are quite comfortable. I have an xbox one and did not need to buy the headset adapter which was a huge bonus. You can hear gameplay through the headset on xbox one, so this is really nice for hearing footsteps around you. Im glad the chord is so long, my PC is in an inconvenient spot so the long chord easily reached. Been gaming back and forth between PC and Xbox one with this headset and had no issues so far, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Collin D.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit!
customer_reviews.text: This headset has amazing sound and comfort. I bought them for my son who really enjoys conversing with other players on his games. He was very excited to receive a high quality set, and uses them regularly. The plug options allow you to play on PlayStation and XBOX units, so he can switch between the two gaming systems we have.
customer_reviews.author: BuyPassShenanigans

customer_reviews.title: My favorite by far
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few gaming headsets, some considerably more expensive than these, but these are my favorite by far, mostly because they feel so solid and well built - not at all flimsy like some other popular brands I could name. Functionally they perform as well as or better than more costly headsets, and they're easily as comfortable.Higher quality, lower cost - what's not to like? Easily 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box I was impressed with the quality. Sound is great for battle Royale games, can hear everything going on around and exactly where it's at.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Gardenhouse

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, low performance
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I really like about this is how cool it looks. Unfortunately it doesn't perform as well as it looks. When I first plugged it into my computer using the USB it didn't detect it. It would only detect it when I used the single headphone plug. It is mostly plastic so durability isn't good in my experience. The ear pads are round so my big ears don't fit well which then makes noise cancellation not possible. In addition, it is stiff so it was uncomfortable while wearing it, making my head feel squeezed.
customer_reviews.author: waban67

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Headphones! These are better than expected. They are large and comfortable. The headphones completely cover my ears which is exactly what I wanted. The sound quality is above average. Good sound range. I use for my PC. The USB seems to only supply power for the blue LEDs, which I don't need, but it does look good.
customer_reviews.author: NetSec

customer_reviews.title: Got exactly what was described and I like them
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to have at home since my boys leave theirs at moms house and they want to use my gaming headphones. Read the reviews and like what I was reading in this price range. I was impressed with the sound when I tried them on for the first time. They fit comfortably over my ears and its nice to be able to adjust the volume on them rather than on pc. My boys will love them and they will want one each..
customer_reviews.author: Angel Cortina

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and works well
customer_reviews.text: I've probably used this product for over a year now and it's still working properly. The only problem is that the sound can sometimes be only on the right side. If you pull out the headphone jack just slightly it usually put the sound back to both ears. Sometimes the connection jack, a separate connection that first connects the headphones to the split microphone and headphone jack needs to be securely tightened otherwise sound quality will be bad or just to one side of the ear. But despite having frequent problems with the sound being on one ear only I think these are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Wong

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Highly Functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset for my daughter during a lightning deal on Black Friday and couldn't be happier. Well built, comfortable over-the-ear cups, nice padding on the top, and great sound quality. I own and use the updated version of the headset and honestly can't tell the difference between the two. Same manual and design.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Don't get this if you wear glasses
customer_reviews.text: I got this headset and the "Runmus," which is actually just another Onikuma headset and they covered up the name. Of the two this one is inferior. Sound quality is not as good, stereo is pretty much non-existent. It might work for some people for really basic gaming like mine-craft, but for fps this is a no go. Quality is okay, but like most headsets at this price, is made in China with cheap plastic. Definitely don't get this one if you wear glasses because it will cause them to cut into your face. Pressure from the ear-covers is too much, maybe due to low quality padding, it has absolutely no give when wearing. I used this on PC only.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula L.

customer_reviews.title: Honestly amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a cheap replacement since my normal gaming headset were finally beginning to cut out. I was extremely surprised with these. They showed up super fast and hold up on everything they're advertised for. The sound quality matches or even exceeds the quality found on $80+ gaming headsets. On top of that, the sound cancellation is amazing. It adds a level of immersion to your gameplay but can honestly suck you in far too easily. And the fit is super comfortable. I used these for a 6 hour session and felt absolutely no discomfort throughout any of that time. Will likely buy another pair for my wife and son should their current ones malfunction.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Ensastiga

customer_reviews.title: Great headset!
customer_reviews.text: This item is very well built, and come with anything you need to connect. I'm not a gamer so I use it only for computer control, dictation, and language learning programs. Very easy to set up in Win 10, speech is very clear, sound is great. The microphone is very good, and I like the fact I can move it up and turn it off when just listening to music. The ear pieces are very comfortable and produce great sound as well as being easdy to adjust for comfort. MUCH better than ny earbuds! Actually cheaper than some better quality earbuds. IMHO< you can't go wrong with these headphones/mic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great price! Great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used several top brands of headsets and this is surprisingly good for the price point, feels very durable and comparable to premium headsets. Sound quality is decent as well. Customer service is very good and the seller is responsive to any issues. You will not be disappointed with this product at all and I will be buying more of these for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars based on Price! (Yes, buy these if on a budget)
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these headphones for the better part of a month now, and for the price, I absolutely love them. They work perfectly with my Xbox One when you have the headphones adapter. They are very comfortable and the sound is decent. The sound does not have that bass or vibrating sound like higher end headphones ($150+), but they definitely do the job and I would recommend anyone on a budget to buy these headphones. Like I said, you can't beat the build quality or the sound for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ddiaz841

customer_reviews.title: A good headset for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've only just received my headset, so my review may be subject to change later on down the line, but after testing them out the quality is immediately noticeable. The audio is outstanding considering the price, and my friends have commented that the audio quality from this mic is much much better than it was with the earpiece I was using before. Again, for the price this was a great value. The only downside (I suppose) for the PS4 is that the LEDs don't light up, but I can't see them anyways so I'm indifferent.
customer_reviews.author: Commander Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ONIKUMA gaming headset after having many turtle beach headsets and I have to say so far I am very impressed. My previous turtle beach headsets malfunctioned after a while ( mike not working or one of the speakers not working) , so I decided to give another brand a try. This ONIKUMA headset has great versatility ( I use it primarily for PS4) and fits comfortably on my head. The sound quality is excellent. All this for under 30 bucks with a life time warranty is unbeatable!
customer_reviews.author: B R

customer_reviews.title: If you are after comfort, these are amaaaaazing!
customer_reviews.text: It took some fiddling with noise cancellation to get rid of some white noise, but for the price, this is a great headset. The sound quality sounds amazing to me (I am no audiophile), but the major thing I was concerned with is comfort and these are perfect for me. I have fibromyalgia and so many headsets are so painful to wear after a while, this one is not painful in the slightest. Not to mention that I recently put my earrings in after forgetting them for a while, so my ear is especially tender, I can't even lay on that side on my memory foam pillow, and these somehow don't hurt it!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good value - but a tad weighty
customer_reviews.text: I've been using them daily for a few weeks and have not found any technical issues. I've not really used the microphone at this point since I'm playing single player games - screaming at game bugs doesn't count as conversation lol. They seem a bit on the heavy side (subjective feeling) and the 'size' adjustment isn't as stable as I would like it. Since my head doesn't change sizes between wearings it would be cool if they could be locked into a certain size. As is is I must adjust them every time I put them on. Not exactly a calorie burning effort but more along the 'quality of life' path. No regrets though since my budget is #1 priority.
customer_reviews.author: R1b5NW1ng5

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement over my old set!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, great microphone, and looks good - durability seems good, as I've dropped it a few times without a problem. I've been very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Grissom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gaming Headset
customer_reviews.text: I am using this headset to play on my xbox one , it works great ! I love this headset !
customer_reviews.author: Bryan K.

product_meta.title: ONIKUMA Gaming Headset for PS4, PS4 Gaming Headset with 7.1 Surround Sound, Xbox One Headset with Noise Canceling Mic LED Light, Over-Ear Headphones for PS4, Xbox One, PC, Mac, Laptop (Black)
product_meta.description:
How Do Our Customers Think of Us?

 * About Sound Quality

The sound quality for this price range is unusually great. It has full surround sound, where the sound moves based on direction, and a BALANCED sound: not overbearing bass or highs while both are still present. -Minasan19

Sound quality is awesome, surround soundis great, allows me to hear the animals and foot steps and whatnot in my hunting game. Same with Far Cry 5 when i'm out hunting game to get extra cash, i can tell if they're behind me to the left of right or whatever. -Kormath

 * About Microphone

...partner (who lives 700 miles away in Wisconsin), said my voice was the most crystal clear he'd heard it in ages. -Bludingutz

The outgoing sound is equally as clear, and the mic only pics up what it should pick up. Background noise will not key up your mic, and you will hear no static. -Angie Dennis

 * About Comfort Level

...After I received mine, I immediately used it for a 5-hour gaming session. I wear glasses, which sometimes can be annoying while wearing headsets and start to feel painful after a while. I didn't feel any discomfort even after 5 hours. Both the cushioning on the top and the pads around the ears are very comfortable, and they seem durable too. -Joost Op 't Eynde

I wear glasses, and I've usually found that over-the-ear headphones are really painful after a while. As such, I usually default to earbuds, which allow me to listen to music for longer periods of time. However, I saw these headphones and figured I'd give them a try. And you know what? They're really comfortable, even with glasses on! I have them extended, so that they aren't pulling up on my ears at all (so they're just resting on my head and over my ears), and they're very comfortable -David Mortenson



Specifications:

Driver diameter: 50mm

Impedance: 16 Ohm

Sensitivity: 114dB +/- 3dB at 1KHz

Frequency range: 20Hz-20KHz

Mic sensitivity: -36dB +/- 1dB

Mic impedance: 2.2k Ohm

Headset interface: 3.5mm + USB (USB for LED light)



ONIKUMA K5 headset is your best friend in game playing, no matter from the concept of product itself or after-sale customer service.

Wear ONIKUMA Headphones, Realize Heroic Dream.​
feature_bullets: 【Super Real Gaming Experience】ONIKUMA K5 gaming headset maximizes the clarity of sound with 7.1 Surround technology. High-grade 60mm driver with neodymium magnets delivers clean clear bass. Just take your gaming experience to a higher level!

【Great Wide Compatibility】Onikuma gaming headset works on Nintendo Switch (audio), Nintendo New 3DS LL/3DS (audio), Nintendo 3DS LL/3DS (audio), Windows PC, Mac OS PC, iOS device, Android device, PS4, PS3, PS vita, Xbox 360 and Xbox One(adapter not included)

【Best-in-Class Mic and Fingertip Control】 ONIKUMA gaming headset is adjustable and flexible to pick up sound in 360 degree. It equipped with strong cords and joints and features long-lasting durability with USB Mute & Volume Control.

【Lightweight and Comfort Design】Crafted for long gaming sessions. Our PS4 Headset innovates in shape and breathable material for play-all-night comfort! Padded softly, the over-ear ergonomic ear cup is thicker and bigger to isolate ambient noise.

【100% Reliable After-service 】every ONIKUMA gaming headset comes with 7x24rs after-service and 30 days no reason return. If you have any problem about our gaming headphones, please directly contact ONIKUMA customer service team. We promise to provide your a satisfied solution.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars5,981 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
